July 7, 1906 D Pontypridd Contest (Class A)
Pontypridd Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-a
Il Trovatore [unknown arranger]
Pontypridd, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK 1st prize £15 and cup, 2nd prize £10, 3rd prize £5, 4th prize £3. 6 bands competed.
March 7, 2012, 4:59 p.m. Sept. 14, 2018, 10:46 a.m.
